Title: arrayUnion(arr)
Description: Takes multiple arrays, returns an array that contains all elements that are present in any of the source arrays.
Examples: SELECT    arrayUnion([-2, 1], [10, 1], [-2], []) as num_example,    arrayUnion(['hi'], [], ['hello', 'hi']) as str_example,    arrayUnion([1, 3, NULL], [2, 3, NULL]) as null_example
